person.persName: Benjamin S. Lindsay (Kentucky attorney and justice of the peace)

body.p: Kentucky attorney and justice of the peace.Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Conner Lindsay on January 23, 1861. Attorney in Carroll County, Kentucky, in 1860. Justice of the peace in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1865.
